Job Title: Accounting Associate

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Description

To apply to this hybrid role, please send your resume to John Sadofsky at john.sadofsky@roberthalf.c0m

Feeling stuck or straight up bored at your current job? Let’s fix that. A high-End Investment firm is seeking a Senior Accountant. Perks include including above market pay-rates, top-tier health benefits, plenty of work from home flexibility, and other unique perks that their top competitors can’t to provide.

Job Description

Individual/Foundation Group Accounting Assistant position within a 50 person professional services firm which provides accounting, tax compliance and planning, legal, trust administration, business management, financial management, treasury and technology services to the enterprises of two wealthy families, including business entities, trusts, individuals and foundations. This position reports to the Senior Accountant and Manager of Individual/Foundation Group and works with all of the other professional service providers.

Responsibilities

Assisting in the process of maintaining general ledgers, including preparation of accounting entries for the day to day transactions and other activity; Accounts payable, including reviewing invoices for appropriate and proper approvals and preparing check or wire journal entries for payment; Accounts receivable and cash receipts, including preparation of journal entries to record cash receipts and reconciliation of accounts, when necessary; Assist with special projects, as needed.


Requirements

Desired skills 

A minimum of 3 years work experience in accounting or equivalent experienceWell-developed analytical, problem-solving, and Microsoft skills (Excel, Work, and Outlook);Experience with data entry in spreadsheet and database environments;Excellent organizational skills with an acute awareness of deadlines;Ability to work effectively and efficiently in a team-oriented environment with all levels of personnel.


To apply to this hybrid role, please send your resume to John Sadofsky at john.sadofsky@roberthalf.c0m
